header.title: Kumuluz Digital Platform
header.subtitle: Everything you need to fast-track your digital transformation, with the open, light-weight digital platform.

strategy.title: Fast-track your digital transformation
strategy.description:
Kumuluz Digital Platform provides the necessary building blocks to adopt cloud-native, microservice and API-based development, integrate with back-end and cloud, and develop progressive UX and Marketplace applications.

Use only parts of the platform vital for your digital transformation:
strategy.quote: A network of interconnected, scalable and agile digital applications

weForYou.title: What KumuluzDigital platform can do for you
weForYou.descriptionLeft:
KumuluzDigital platform is the award-winning solution that companies use to implement and accelerate their digital transformation.

KumuluzDigital Platform provides you all the building blocks necessary to fast-track the development of your digital business. The platform enables you fast implementation of your digital strategy.

With KumuluzDigital, you will introduce the latest cloud-native concepts, microservices, APIs and Docker containers. You will adopt agile development, DevOps principles and Continuous Delivery to fast track your development. You will be finally able to modernize your monolithic applications. You will develop sophisticated user experience and complex marketplace solutions.
weForYou.descriptionRight:
The benefits are enormous. You will significantly reduce time-to-market for your digital products, services, applications and marketplace solution with using our platform, agile, DevOps and other cloud-native methods for continuous delivery.

And there is much more: Kumuluz Digital offers you the tools to create sophisticated responsive user experience, rapidly develop your own digital marketplaces, implement API economy business models, communicate with your customers in new ways, engage customers, sense their needs and respond instantly, gather digital payments and add many other exciting features, indispensable for the digital economy.

advantages.title: All the advantages you get with the Kumuluz Digital platform
advantages.subtitle: Implement and accelerate your digital transformation.
advantages.advantage1: For organization transitioning to microservices & cloud-native architecture
advantages.advantage3: Deploys on-premises in your data center or in the cloud
advantages.advantage4: Preserves investment in your existing knowledge and skills
advantages.advantage5: Minimal upfront and completely flexible investment

caseStudy.title: Case study example: SaaS and IoT devices with on premise back-end applications
caseStudy.description: KumuluzIntegration addresses the integration challenges between SaaS applications and/or on premise applications. KumuluzIntegration enables you to integrate and synchronize your SaaS and/or on premise applications in matter of minutes.

advantages.title: Using cutting edge innovations in data integration, such as event driven integration:
advantages.advantage2: 12% load SaaS and/or on premise applications

quote.quote: With KumuluzDigital, you will introduce the latest cloud native concepts, microservices, APIs and Docker containers. You will adopt agile development, DevOps principles and Continuous Delivery to fast-track your development. You will be finally able to modernize your monolithic applications.

what-are-apis.title: Kumuluz Business APIs
what-are-apis.subtitle: There is no need to develop from scratch. Don't speed your development with half-build solutions. Just add functionalities using our business APIs.

item-1.title: What are Kumuluz Business APIs?
item-1.desc: Kumuluz Business APIs are pre-built APIs for common digital functionalities, which allow you to fast-track your development by including your pre-built and tested API's, use, customize and extend them.

item-2.title: Who are Kumuluz Business APIs for?
item-2.desc:
Our business APIs are primary used by big enterprises, startups, government and agencies.

... and all other enterprises that need to speeed up the development.

item-3.title: What is the cost of the Kumuluz Business APIs?
item-3.desc:
You can test some of the APIs for free or we can do a demo for you.

To use the APIs to full extent you download selected ones as docker container for one time payment.

smart-assistant.title: Accelerate AI integration with pre-built components
smart-assistant.block1: Our AI Smart Assistant and solution accelerators provide pre-built, tested and customizable components that enable seamless AI integration into your existing business applications, shortening development cycles and driving innovation faster.

servicerange.title: Grow and optimize your business with robust, scalable and secure AI solutions tailored to the unique challenges of your industry

box-1.title: Optimized AI implementation
box-1.description: Shorten time-to-market and increases efficiency across all business processes

box-2.title: Customizable to your needs
box-2.description: Easily modify, extend and integrate components into existing systems

box-3.title: Innovation at your fingertips
box-3.description: By removing development bottlenecks, you can innovate faster

box-4.title: Long-term scalability and reliability
box-4.description: Secure your software infrastructure with a flexible, cloud-ready platform

services.title: Capabilities of Kumuluz AI Smart Assistant
services.subtitle: Our advanced AI Smart Assistant is packed with features and capabilities that allow you to quickly adopt AI technologies while minimizing development risks:

library.title: Comprehensive
library.subtitle: API library
library.description: Our pre-built APIs cover a wide range of components that are designed to be integrated into AI workflows with minimal customization and provide a solid foundation for advanced AI capabilities.

items.item-5: Automated machine learning API and others

architecture.title: for future growth
architecture.description: All of our APIs are built on scalable, cloud-native architectures that ensure your solutions can grow with your business. Whether you're working with huge data sets or need real-time AI processing capabilities, our solutions are optimized to deliver consistent performance at scale.

security.title: Data Security
security.subtitle: and Privacy
security.description: Kumuluz AI components have been designed with data security and privacy in mind. All data and documents, processed by AI components, are always processed confidentially and privately, without the possibility of escaping to the Internet or sharing the content.

framework.title: and customizable framework
framework.description: Unlike rigid one-size-fits-all solutions, Kumuluz APIs are fully customizable and extensible. Your teams can modify and adapt them to your specific business environment to ensure that AI integration enhances, rather than disrupts, existing workflows.

integration.title: Seamless integration
integration.subtitle: across platforms
integration.description: Kumuluz solution accelerators are designed to work with a variety of platforms and enable seamless integration into your existing technology stack. Whether you're working with legacy systems or cloud-native applications, our APIs and AI accelerators ensure compatibility and efficiency.

item-1.title: AI-supported customer loyalty
item-1.description: A large organization used the Kumuluz AI Smart Assistant to automate their customer support. By integrating AI-powered chatbots and virtual assistants into their platform, the company was able to reduce response times, increase customer satisfaction and free up human resources for more complex tasks.

item-2.title: AI-knowledge management
item-2.description: A large company used AI-powered knowledge management and onboarding systems with Kumuluz’s pre-built AI chatbot APIs to optimize internal knowledge sharing and onboarding. The solution enabled employees to quickly search for and access relevant information, while new employees received personalized, AI-driven onboarding support.

item-3.title: Advanced data analysis and reporting
item-3.description: A leading financial services company used Kumuluz's pre-built APIs to implement an AI-driven financial reporting system. By automating data collection and analysis, the company was able to drastically reduce the time spent on manual reporting and gain real-time insights into financial performance.

cta.title: Get started with Kumuluz AI Smart Assistant
cta.end-1: Ready to transform your business with AI-powered solutions? Try our Kumuluz AI Smart Assistant to quickly implement AI in your business applications with pre-built, tested components that reduce complexity and drive innovation.
cta.end-2: Unlock the potential of AI for your business. Get started today and take the first step towards future-proofing your business with AI.

knowledge-mentor.title: AI-powered solutions for knowledge management and onboarding
knowledge-mentor.block1: A revolutionary AI knowledge management platform that consolidates your organization's expertise into one intelligent and employee-engaging system. AI Knowledge Mentor is designed to continuously grow and adapt with usage.
knowledge-mentor.block2: It improves employee onboarding, promotes seamless knowledge sharing and ensures that important information is always accessible — whether it’s a simple issue or a complex operational question.

servicerange.title: Transform knowledge management with AI Knowledge Mentor

box-1.title: Centralized knowledge hub
box-1.description: All internal knowledge, from operational procedures to company policies, is available on one easily accessible platform

box-2.title: Continuous learning and growth
box-2.description: As employees use the platform, AI Knowledge Mentor expands its database, updating and improving it automatically over time

box-3.title: Improved onboarding with gamification
box-3.description: New hires experience an interactive, gamified onboarding process that increases engagement

box-4.title: Seamless integration and security
box-4.description: Knowledge Mentor integrates with your internal document management systems, ensuring secure access to confidential company knowledge

servicerange.end: AI Knowledge Mentor acts as the digital brain of your organization, ensuring that your employees have instant access to all approved knowledge of your company. By securely integrating with your existing document systems, Knowledge Mentor ensures that your data is secure while being available where and when it is needed.

interface.title: A simple and engaging interface employees will love to use
interface.description: No complex structures, no tedious searching for documents and no time wasted looking for the right answer.

features.title: AI Knowledge Mentor features
features.subtitle: AI Knowledge Mentor’s powerful features promote corporate knowledge management, learning and operational efficiency:

knowledge.title: AI-powered knowledge graph
knowledge.description: The platform dynamically links information from different areas and creates a knowledge graph that becomes more intelligent with every interaction.

nlp.title: Natural language processing (NLP)
nlp.description: Employees can ask questions in everyday language, from simple logistical questions to complex procedural queries, and receive precise answers immediately.

gamification.title: Intelligent onboarding with gamification
gamification.description: The platform provides a gamified onboarding experience that keeps new employees engaged, tracks their progress and ensures they are familiar with the company's processes and standards.

integration.title: Secure integration with document systems
integration.description: AI Knowledge Mentor securely connects to your internal document repositories so that relevant data can be retrieved, ensuring it is secure, updated and easily accessible.

scalable.title: Scalable knowledge building
scalable.description: AI Knowledge Mentor adapts as your organization evolves. Administrators have the ability to monitor and control the creation of internal wikis, documents and knowledge nodes.

adaptable.title: Adaptable to company needs
adaptable.description: Customize the platform to your specific knowledge management needs so that the solution grows with your business and evolves with your processes.

use-cases.title: Use cases for AI Knowledge Mentor
use-cases.subtitle: Learn more how companies revolutionized their knowledge management and onboarding:

item-1.title: AI-supported onboarding of employees
item-1.description:
A multinational company used AI Knowledge Mentor to streamline the onboarding of its employees. The platform offered new employees a gamified learning path with quizzes, interactive modules and progress monitoring.

This not only increased engagement, but also reduced onboarding time by 30% and ensured faster integration of new team members.

item-2.title: Real-time knowledge query for employees
item-2.description: A technology company implemented AI Knowledge Mentor to reduce the time employees spend searching for internal resources. With the AI-driven prompting system, employees could instantly ask questions such as:
item-2.point-1: "What is the process for submitting expenses?"
item-2.point-2: "Who is the person in charge of the marketing project?" and similar.
item-2.end: This improved day-to-day efficiency and increased overall productivity.

item-3.title: Maintaining internal standards and best practices
item-3.description: A large company used AI Knowledge Mentor to centralize their ever-evolving compliance and regulatory documentation. The platform provided real-time updates to policies and procedures, ensuring staff across multiple sites were adhering to the latest standards.

item-4.title: Facilitating knowledge sharing across departments
item-4.description:
A financial services company used AI Knowledge Mentor to break down silos between departments. By integrating knowledge across finance, HR and IT systems, the platform enabled seamless collaboration and faster decision making.

Employees from different teams can now easily find detailed company information, improving communication and efficiency between departments.

cta.title: Unlock the future of knowledge management
cta.end-1: Are you ready to revolutionize knowledge management and onboarding processes in your company? Try AI Knowledge Mentor — your AI-powered solution to consolidate internal knowledge, increase onboarding efficiency and ensure seamless knowledge sharing across your organization.
cta.end-2: Give your teams real-time access to everything they need to succeed - from onboarding to complex business processes.
cta.end-3: Get started today and take the first step towards future-proofing your business with AI Knowledge Mentor.
